title: TAMU Libraries HathiTrust Schema
comment: profile, classes and properties are required; contexts and mappings are not

capture_date.title: Capture Date
capture_date.description: The date and approximate time the volume was scanned in ISO 8601 combined date format

scanner_user.title: Scanner User
scanner_user.description: This value should reflect “who pushed the button” to actually scan the item. This could be a person, an organizational unit or the name of an outside vendor

bitonal_resolution_dpi.title: Bitonal Resolution DPI
bitonal_resolution_dpi.description: If submitting any bitone (black & white, normally TIFF) images, input the DPI of those images. Only input numbers.

contone_resolution_dpi.title: Contone Resolution DPI
contone_resolution_dpi.description: If submitting any continuous tone (contone) images (grayscale or color, normally JP2 but HathiTrust will convert contone TIFF), input the DP of those images. Only input numbers.

image_compression_date.title: Image Compression Date
image_compression_date.description: The date and approximate time the images were compressed or converted to JPEG2000 before creation of the submission package

image_compression_agent.title: Image Compression Agent
image_compression_agent.description: The HathiTrust institution identifier of who applied compression

image_compression_tool.title: Image Compression Tool
image_compression_tool.description: The Software Name and Version used to compress the images. Is an array of strings and can have multiple values.

scanner_make.title: Scanner Make
scanner_make.description: The make of the original scanner that digitized the images. Optional.

scanner_model.title: Scanner Model
scanner_model.description: The model of the original scanner that digitized the images. Optional.

scanning_order.title: Scanning Order
scanning_order.description: The order of the scanned images.  If not included, defaults to left-to-right.

reading_order.title: Reading Order
reading_order.description: The order the scanned images should be read in.  If not included, defaults to left-to-right.

pagedata.title: Page Data
pagedata.description: A property that supports navigation and accessibility across the digitized text

label.title: Label
label.description: Holds the source page tag. Since HathiTrust allows us to have multiple values separated by a comma, we can't use an enum.
